title: Half off deposit with TWIC card!
app_fee: NO application fee for a limited time!
posting_body: Embrace a life of modern convenience and unexpected charm at Sienna Villas Apartments.
Our contemporary one, two, and three bedroom apartments in Freeport boast expansive floor plans and exceptional features.
Granite countertops and custom cabinetry adorn the gourmet kitchen, while sleek stainless steel appliances and built in microwave enhance your time in the kitchen.
Our gated community nestled out of the way on a quiet cul-de-sac also offers exceptional amenities like our sparkling swimming pool, and a fitness center to help you keep hitting your goals.
Experience amazing living with an apartment at Sienna Villas Apartments in Freeport, Texas.
